column4: How often do you guys download updates? 8.10 is working great here on adm64 / 2cpu.
once a day
How do you know that today's update is legit? It's not even listed on the security updates webpage.
legit? I've just set it to download updates once a day and apply security fixes right away
try changing the keyboard shortcuts in compiz if you're using the desktop effects
size?.. how do you mean?
ah..hmm
what part of yahoo.com is slow for you?
: typing into the Search bar isn't exactly realtime. It takes a second for the typed text to show up sometimes.  Re: yahoo.com
no problems here.. there is a little lag but I guess that's because it does "search as you type".. and it's nowhere near a second.. more like 1/10 of a second
you are running the regular flash plugin?
: I think so. Im on x86_64.
ok, you are using the non free flash, right?
it's doing a lot of stuff "behind the scenes" for each keypress.. if you're using a slow dns that might be what is killing it
you can try installing a caching dns server too
do you know of an url I could try? something that ought to crash the 64bit flash plugin?
I think GIMP uses the regular fonts.. including ttf fonts
there are plugins that let you fake the useragent
you could make the interface that has the internet connection ipv6 only ?
: How do you specify that?
I think you can set it up either in /etc/network/interfaces.. or perhaps in the network manager.. not really sure but that's where I would start looking
: okay, thanks.
